member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.BitmapResource
member.summary: A subclass of Resource which provides specific methods for manipulating the resource data.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource
member.summary: Represents a Win32 resource which can be loaded from and saved to a PE file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.#ctor(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Resource object without any data. The data can be later loaded from a file.
member.param: Type of the resource; may be one of the ResourceType constants or a user-defined type.
Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.#ctor(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType,System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new Resource object with data. The data can be later saved to a file.
member.param: Type of the resource; may be one of the ResourceType constants or a user-defined type.
Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the resource data from a file. The file is searched for a resource with matching type, name, and locale.
member.param: Win32 PE file containing the resource

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the resource to a file. Any existing resource data with matching type, name, and locale is overwritten.
member.param: Win32 PE file to contain the resource

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Tests if type, name, and locale of this Resource object match another Resource object.
member.returns: True if the objects represent the same resource; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets a hash code for this Resource object.
member.returns: Hash code generated from the resource type, name, and locale.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.ResourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the resource. This may be one of the ResourceType constants or a user-defined type name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, the decimal number is prefixed with a "#".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Locale
member.summary: Gets or sets the locale of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw data of the resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.BitmapResource.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new BitmapResource object without any data. The data can be later loaded from a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.BitmapResource.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new BitmapResource object with data. The data can be later saved to a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.BitmapResource.ReadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the bitmap from a .bmp file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.GroupIconResource
member.summary: A subclass of Resource which provides specific methods for manipulating the resource data.

member.summary: Creates a new GroupIconResource object without any data. The data can be later loaded from a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.summary: Creates a new GroupIconResource object with data. The data can be later saved to a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.GroupIconResource.ReadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the icon group from a .ico file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.GroupIconResource.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw data of the resource. The data is in the format of the RT_GROUPICON resource structure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.GroupIconResource.Icons
member.summary: Enumerates the the icons in the icon group.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection
member.summary: Allows reading and editing of resource data in a Win32 PE file.
member.remarks:
To use this class:
Create a new ResourceCollection
Locate resources for the collection by calling one of the methods
Load data of one or more s from a file by calling the method of the Resource class, or load them all at once (more efficient) with the method of the ResourceCollection.
Read and/or edit data of the individual Resource objects using the methods on that class.
Save data of one or more s to a file by calling the method of the Resource class, or save them all at once (more efficient) with the method of the ResourceCollection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new, empty ResourceCollection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Locates all resources in a file, including all resource types and languages. For each located resource, a instance (or subclass) is added to the collection.
member.param: The file to be searched for resources.
member.exception: resources could not be read from the file

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Find(System.String,Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType)
member.summary: Locates all resources in a file of a given type, including all languages. For each located resource, a instance (or subclass) is added to the collection.
member.param: The file to be searched for resources.
The type of resource to search for; may be one of the ResourceType constants or a user-defined type.
member.exception: resources could not be read from the file

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Find(System.String,Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType,System.String)
member.summary: Locates all resources in a file of a given type and language. For each located resource, a instance (or subclass) is added to the collection.
member.param: The file to be searched for resources.
The type of resource to search for; may be one of the ResourceType constants or a user-defined type.
The name of the resource to search for.
member.exception: resources could not be read from the file

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Load(System.String)
member.summary: For all resources in the collection, loads their data from a resource file.
member.param: The file from which resources are loaded.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Save(System.String)
member.summary: For all resources in the collection, saves their data to a resource file.
member.param: The file to which resources are saved.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Add(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource)
member.summary: Adds a new item to the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Remove(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource)
member.summary: Removes an item to the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.IndexOf(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource)
member.summary: Gets the index of an item in the collection.
member.returns: The index of the item, or -1 if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource)
member.summary: Inserts a item into the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Contains(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource)
member.summary: Tests if the collection contains an item.
member.returns: true if the item is found; false otherwise

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.CopyTo(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.Resource[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the collection into an array.
member.param: The starting index in the destination array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all resources from the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator over all resources in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of resources in the collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType
member.summary: Represents either a standard integer resource type or a custom resource type name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new resource type from a string resource name.
member.param: String resource name, or an integer resource type prefixed by a #.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new integer resource type.
member.param: Integer value of a well-known resource type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.ToString
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the resource type.
member.returns: The custom resource name, or the name of a well-known resource type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Tests whether one resource type equals another object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.Equals(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType)
member.summary: Tests whether one resource type equals another.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets a hash code suitable for using the resource type as a dictionary key.
member.returns: Hash code based on the resource type string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.op_Implicit(System.String)~Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType
member.summary: Implicitly converts a string to a ResourceType.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.op_Explicit(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType)~System.String
member.summary: Explicitly converts a ResourceType to a string.
member.remarks: Unlike , this conversion does not return the common name of well-known integer resource types. Therefore, the returned string is suitable for passing directly to Win32 resource APIs that accept resource type strings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.IsInteger
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether the resource type is an integer type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.ResourceType.IntegerValue
member.summary: Gets the integer value of the resource type, or -1 if the resource type is not an integer.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionBuildTypes
member.summary: Identifies build types of a versioned file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionFileType
member.summary: Identifies the type of a versioned file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionFileSubtype
member.summary: Identifies the sub-type of a versioned file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource
member.summary: A subclass of Resource which provides specific methods for manipulating the resource data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new VersionResource object without any data. The data can be later loaded from a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new VersionResource object with data. The data can be later saved to a file.
member.param: Name of the resource. For a numeric resource identifier, prefix the decimal number with a "#".

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Add(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a new version string table for a locale.
member.returns: The new string table, or the existing table if the locale already existed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a version string table for a locale.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a version string table exists for a given locale.
member.returns: True if a string table was found for the locale; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Clear
member.summary: Removes all string tables from the version resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.CopyTo(Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionStringTable[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the version string tables to an array, starting at a particular array index.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection. The Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that can iterate over the version string tables in the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that can iterate over the version string tables in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw data of the resource. The data is in the format of the VS_VERSIONINFO structure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the string table for a specific locale, or null if there is no table for that locale.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Deployment.Resources.VersionResource.Count
